segments.text: Hi , again . Can I get you some more fruit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , I don't think I can eat another bite !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I think we want to pay our bill .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you give me your credit card , I can take care of it for you .
segments.speaker: S1
